- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.

- [x] Clarify Project Requirements
	React.js healthcare demo application frontend with Material-UI, React Router, Axios for API calls, modern dashboard layout with sidebar navigation, and CRUD functionality for patients, doctors, appointments, and prescriptions. Configure to run on port 3030 and connect to backend API at http://localhost:3010.

- [x] Scaffold the Project
	Successfully created React project using Vite with React template in current directory.

- [x] Customize the Project
	Implemented comprehensive healthcare management system with:
	- Dashboard with statistics and quick actions
	- Patients module (list, detail, add, edit, delete)
	- Doctors module (list, add, edit, delete)
	- Appointments module (list, schedule, update, cancel)
	- Prescriptions module (list, add, edit, delete)
	- Material-UI design system
	- React Router navigation
	- Form validation with Yup
	- Toast notifications
	- Responsive layout with sidebar navigation

- [x] Install Required Extensions
	No extensions needed for this project type.

- [x] Compile the Project
	Successfully built project without errors. All dependencies installed and configured.

- [x] Create and Run Task
	Created and started development server task running on http://localhost:3030/

- [x] Launch the Project
	Development server is running on http://localhost:3030/ and ready for use.

- [x] Ensure Documentation is Complete
	README.md updated with comprehensive project information, setup instructions, and feature documentation.
